backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that manages a persistent key-value map of labels, exposing functions to initialize defaults, add, rename, delete, and retrieve labels.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three UI requirements (label filter instant-update, permanent trash delete, empty trash) to their relevant source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and notable changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom property color tokens for light and dark themes, applied globally to all elements and the body.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for MyOrganizer Pro that loads two Google Fonts stylesheet links (covering Inter, Poppins, Roboto, Montserrat, and others), PWA meta tags, and the React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for MyOrganizer Pro defining app name, display mode, theme colors, and two icon sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first with network-update strategy for same-origin GET requests, with install/activate lifecycle handlers to manage cache versioning.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing tab-based navigation, lazy-loading Notes and Records pages, initializing app settings and seeding the database on mount, and registering the service worker.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSp: Exports a spinning LoadingSpinner component and a PageSkeleton placeholder used as Suspense fallbacks during lazy page loads.
frontend/src/components/common/Modal.tsx: Reusable modal dialog component with scroll lock, Escape key handling, focus management, configurable size, and an optional title/close button header.
frontend/src/components/common/ToastCont: Renders a stack of toast notifications from the toast store, displaying success, error, or info variants with icons and a dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/home/QuoteWidget: A clickable home widget that displays the user's daily quote (text, author, and custom styling) using the useQuote hook, with a fallback prompt if no quote exists.
frontend/src/components/home/StreakWidge: A clickable home widget showing the user's current check-in streak count, last check-in time, and a today-checked indicator using the useStreak hook.
frontend/src/components/home/TodayRoutin: A clickable home widget that previews up to four items from today's routine profile (determined by day type) using the useRoutines hook, with formatted times.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout component that composes the desktop AppSidebar, scrollable main content area, and mobile BottomTabBar with active tab state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Desktop-only sidebar with logo, navigation buttons for all app tabs, active state highlighting, and a footer attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Mobile-only fixed bottom navigation bar rendering icon+label tab buttons with active state styling for all five app sections.
frontend/src/components/notes/LabelManag: A modal dialog for creating, renaming, and deleting note labels, including a confirmation overlay for destructive deletes and bulk label reassignment on deletion.
frontend/src/components/notes/MultiSelec: A fixed top toolbar shown during multi-note selection that displays the selected count and provides Archive, Trash, and Clear selection actions.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteCard.t: A note card component supporting long-press selection, custom background colors, pin indicators, and previews for text, checklist, and image note types with a context menu for actions.
A modal component for viewing and editing a note, supporting text, checklist, and image note types with color picking, label selection, reminders, and image upload/compression.
frontend/src/components/notes/QuickAddBa: A collapsible bar component that lets users quickly create a new note by selecting between text, checklist, or image note types.
frontend/src/components/streak/CheckInBu: Displays the current streak count and a button to check in for the day, showing a confirmed state once the user has already checked in.
frontend/src/components/streak/StreakCal: Renders a monthly calendar view highlighting days the user checked in, with navigation controls to move between months.
frontend/src/db/db.ts: Instantiates and exports a singleton OrganizerDB class that exposes typed Table instances for all app data stores (notes, routines, records, streak, quotes, labels, imageBlobs, settings).
frontend/src/db/idb.ts: A lightweight native IndexedDB wrapper providing a Table class with add, put, get, delete, toArray, count, and clear operations, replacing Dexie.
frontend/src/db/schema.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all database entities including Note, RoutineProfile, Record, StreakData, QuoteData, Label, ImageBlob, and AppSettings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageStorage.ts: A React hook providing saveImage, getImageUrl, and deleteImage helpers that persist and retrieve image blobs in the IndexedDB imageBlobs store.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabels.ts: Custom hook for managing labels in IndexedDB, providing CRUD operations (create, update, delete) with duplicate/reserved-name guards and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Custom hook for managing notes in IndexedDB, supporting create/update/delete/trash/archive/restore operations, filtering by view, search, and label, and bulk selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all labels and initializing default labels via the backend actor, with IndexedDB used for all other data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuote.ts: Custom hook for managing a motivational quote stored in IndexedDB, supporting save and rotation (shuffle or daily) modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecords.ts: Custom hook for managing records in IndexedDB with CRUD operations, search/date filtering, and JSON export functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoutines.ts: Custom hook for managing weekday and weekend routine profiles in IndexedDB, supporting item add/update/delete/reorder and completion toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollLock.ts: Custom hook that locks and unlocks body scroll by toggling CSS styles, preserving the scroll position when unlocked.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreak.ts: Custom React hook that manages daily check-in streak data using IndexedDB, handling streak counting, broken streaks, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens plus reusable component classes like note-card and masonry-grid.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component displaying a live clock, greeting, and widgets for streak, quote, and today's routine, plus a floating action button for quick note creation.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Notes page with search, label filtering, view tabs, multi-select bulk actions, and modals for creating/editing notes and managing labels.
frontend/src/pages/QuotePage.tsx: Quote settings page allowing users to customize and save a motivational quote with font, size, color, alignment, blur, and rotation options, plus a managed quote list.
frontend/src/pages/RecordsPage.tsx: Records page providing search, date-range filtering, add/edit/delete via a modal form, and JSON export for user-created records.
frontend/src/pages/RoutinesPage.tsx: Renders a tabbed routines page (Today/Weekdays/Weekends) with drag-and-drop reordering, add/edit/delete modal form, and completion toggling for routine items.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page for customizing theme, accent color, font family, and background image, plus data export/import and storage usage display.
frontend/src/pages/StreakPage.tsx: Displays the user's daily check-in streak with current count, total check-ins, last check-in time, and a calendar history view.
frontend/src/store/appStore.ts: Zustand store managing app-wide UI settings (theme, accent color, font) with functions to apply and persist each setting to localStorage and the DOM.
frontend/src/store/toastStore.ts: Zustand store for managing toast notifications with auto-dismiss after 3.5 seconds, exposing helper functions for success, error, and info toasts.
frontend/src/utils/dataValidation.ts: Validates imported JSON data by checking for required top-level arrays (notes, routines, records, labels) and returns a result with any errors.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormatter.ts: Utility function that formats a date string, number, or Date object into a human-readable '28 Feb 2026, 3:45 AM' format, handling edge cases like date-only strings and invalid input.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Provides canvas-based image compression to JPEG with configurable max width and quality, plus a thumbnail generation helper.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Handles browser notification permission requests and schedules a delayed native notification at a specified timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/seedData.ts: Seeds the IndexedDB database with default notes, records, streak, quotes, and routines if those tables are empty on first run.
frontend/src/utils/serviceWorkerRegistra: Registers the app's service worker on page load, silently ignoring failures so the app continues to function without it.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Thin localStorage wrapper for persisting and retrieving the three small UI settings: theme, accent color, and font family.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending theme with custom fonts (Inter, Poppins, etc.), oklch-based color tokens, border radius, box shadows, and enabling dark mode, typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state descriptor for a Notes app bug-fix task, documenting two known issues (labels filter bar not updating instantly on add/rename, and permanent delete from Trash not working) along with their feature requirements and fix scope.
